results.name: Row sums of self-inverse triangle A118433.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,-4).
mathematica: a[n_] := 2^(Floor[(n+1)/2]-3)*(-2*Mod[n, 8] + Mod[n+2 , 8] - Mod[n+3, 8] + 2*Mod[n+4, 8] - Mod[n+6, 8] + Mod[n+7, 8]); Table[a[n], {n, 0, 44}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 23 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 28 2006
